Description: Solid-cast bronze standing sphinx; attached beard and tail; hole in head for attachment of headgear.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Krete-Aigyptos (in Greek), Heraklion 2000, p. 168 [147]. G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.18.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990 24 Mar-10 Jun, Australia, Canberra, National Gallery of Australia, Civilization: Ancient Treasures from the British Museum, cat. no.49 1990 28 Jun-23 Sep, Australia, Melbourne, Museum of Victoria, Civilization: Ancient Treasures from the British Museum, cat. no.49 1990 20 Oct-9 Dec, Japan, Tokyo, Setagaya Art Museum, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.85 1991 5 Jan-20 Feb, Japan, Yamaguchi, Prefectural Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.85 1991 9 Mar-7 May, Japan, Osaka, National Museum of Art, Treasures of the British Museum, cat. no.85 2011-2012 'Fantastic Creatures'
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
